page.title: 18HOBBIES
page.content: My Motor-bike. I am ten years old and I have a motor-bike that I use for Trails. First I get it out of the shed and then I kick start it, then I put it into gear and rev it up and ride it up to the fields. It feels smooth on the road but when you get onto the field it is very bumpy. When I go over bumps I stand up but if I'm travelling over smooth surfaces I sit down. Emily's hobby is stamp collecting, she has about 2 million stamps from many different nations. Emily and her friends really enjoy sorting and learning about the stamps and their country of origin. Darren, Damian and Stuart collect foreign coins and have collections that include Spanish Peseta, U.S.A. Dollars, French Francs and old Â£.S.d. English coins.
